&#3938;&#3986;&#4017;: [528] ... 1) the'u tshe dang rtags/ ... dam rgya 'debs pa/ ... gsang rgya/ ... dngos po rga can gyi rigs/ ... thag ring du gtong rgyu'i yi ger rgya btab pa/ ... 2) ri dwags sogs 'dzin byed kyi rnyi/ ... bya rgya/ ... nya rgya/ ... ri rgya klung rgya sdom pa/ ... ltad mo grol mtshams thag rgya glod pa/ ... nyes pa'i rgyar tshud pa/ ... the tshom gyi rgyar tshud pa/ ... rgya bcas nas ri dwags glod pa/ ... nya rigs 'dzin pa'i ched du rgya btsugs pa/ ... rngon pa rnams kyis ri dwags rgyas gshor ba/ ... ri dwags sbyang po 'ga' zhig rngon pa'i rgya las 'chor ba/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la ngan pa'i 'phrul 'khor dang/ 'ching byed/ dra ba can/ ri dwags rgya/ ri dwags dra ba/ ri dwags 'dzin bcas so/ 3) khyon/ ... shes rgya chen po/ ... sa zhing rgya chen po/ ... 'khor rgya chen po/ ... las khungs rnams kyi rgya bskums pa/ ... 4) 'gram pa'i spu/ ... mi rgya po/ ... 5) yul gyi ming zhig ... rgya nag ... rgya gar/ ... rgya ser/ ... 6) shing rigs shig gi ming/ ... 7) ri dwags shig gi ming/ ... 8) phyi thum mam skogs/ ... yig rgya/ ... gsang rgya/ ...
extent, width, trap.  In Rdzogs-chen texts, often means confinement.  Skt. jAla; net, trap, latticework.  Klong-chen-pa 9.1, 9.2.  n. of a clan (rus).  Btsan-lha.
India, China, seal, stamp, token, mark, sign, saiga antelope, net, trap, extent, size, it has been sealed, covering, shell, whiskers, GYA

1) the'u tse dang rtags [Dam rgya 'debs pa,...Gsang rgya,...Dngos po rga can gyi rigs,...Thag ring du gtong rgyu'i yi ger rgya btab pa]; 2) net, trap, snare [Ri dvags sogs 'dzin byed kyi rnyi,...Bya rgya,...Nya rgya,...Ri rgya klung rgya sdom pa,...Ltad mo grol mtsams thag rgya glod pa,...Nyes pa'i rgyar tsud pa,...The tsom gyi rgyar tsud pa,...Rgya bcas nas ri dvags glod pa,...Nya rigs 'dzin pa'i ched du rgya btsugs pa,...Rngon pa rnams kyis ri dvags rgyas gshor ba,...Ri dvags sbyang po 'ga' zhig rngon pa'i rgya las 'chor ba,...Syn: ngan pa'i 'phrul 'khor dang, 'ching byed, dra ba can, ri dvags rgya, ri dvags dra ba, ri dvags 'dzin bcas so]; 3) extent [Shes rgya chen po,...Sa zhing rgya chen po,...'Khor rgya chen po,...Las khungs rnams kyi rgya bskums pa]; 4) 'gram pa'i spu; 5) Shing rigs shig gi ming (6) Ri dvags shig gi ming (7) Phyi thum mam skogs [Yig rgya,...Gsang rgya]. 1) CH/ india; 2) extent, area, width; 3) enclosure, trap, net, web; 4) seal, stamp, sign, mark the'u tse dang rtags; 5) symbol, mudra; 6) vast, extensive, extent; 7) law and order; 8) passage; 9) mudra; 10) a kind of tree; 11) a kind of wild animal; 12) 'gram pa'i spu; 13) Phyi thum mam skogs

beard. 1) abbr. of China or India. 2) extent, area, width. 3) enclosure, trap, net, web. 4) seal, stamp, sign, mark; sealed. 5) symbol, mudra. 6) vast, extensive. 7. law and order. 8. passage. 9) mudra Syn {phyag rgya}. 10) a kind of tree 11) a kind of wild animal 12) 'gram pa'i spu 13) phyi thum mam skogs
